items.name: Population Upsize
items.desc: Increases the size of your starting planet by one level.

items.name: Military Base
items.desc: Adds a %s to your starting planet.

items.name: Heavy Industry
items.desc: Adds a %s to your starting planet, or upgrades it if it already exists.

items.name: Soil Fertilization
items.desc: Upgrades the %s resource level on your starting planet by one. If none exists, will add %s for a %s higher cost. Does nothing on water-surface worlds that rely on aquaculture.

items.name: Ore Prospecting
items.desc: Upgrades the %s resource level on your starting planet by one. If none exists, will add %s for a %s higher cost.

items.name: Transplutonics Prospecting
items.desc: Upgrades the %s resource level on your starting planet by one. If none exists, will add %s for a %s higher cost.

items.name: Organics Prospecting
items.desc: Upgrades the %s resource level on your starting planet by one. If none exists, will add %s for a %s higher cost.

items.name: Volatiles Prospecting
items.desc: Upgrades the %s resource level on your starting planet by one. If none exists, will add %s for a %s higher cost.
